statement.para: Given c,r\in \RNr with r\geq 0, the following hold for every x\in \RNr

part.para: \Abs{x-c}\leq r if and only if c-r \leq x \leq c+r if and only if x\in \CCIntrvl{c-r}{c+r}
\Abs{x-c} < r if and only if c-r < x < c+r if and only if x\in \OOIntrvl{c-r}{c+r}

proof.caption: ClosedrNbhd \Abs{x-c}\leq r if and only if c-r \leq x \leq c+r if and only if x\in \CCIntrvl{c-r}{c+r}

math.display.latex: \Abs{ x-c } \leq r\quad \text{if and only if}\quad -r \leq x-c \leq r

proof.para: which holds if and only if
